title: $5000 24k Gold Nintendo!
description: Watch my gameplay on the Analogue Nt -   This is only 1 of 10 units on the planet. Yes it's outlandish, that's kinda the point!  Analogue Nt 24k Gold -   FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
